verses.verse: Finally, <S%G3062><s%> my brethren, <S%G80><s%> rejoice <S%G5463><s%> in the Lord. <S%G2962><s%> To write <S%G1125><s%> the same <S%G846><s%> things <S%G846><s%> [again] is no <S%G3756><s%> trouble <S%G3636><s%> to me, and it is a safeguard <S%G804><s%> for you.
Beware <S%G991><s%> of the dogs, <S%G2965><s%> beware <S%G991><s%> of the evil <S%G2556><s%> workers, <S%G2040><s%> beware <S%G991><s%> of the false <S%G2699><s%> circumcision; <S%G2699><s%>

for we are the [true] circumcision, <S%G4061><s%> who worship <S%G3000><s%> in the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> and glory <S%G2744><s%> in Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> and put <S%G3982><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> confidence <S%G3982><s%> in the flesh, <S%G4561><s%>

although <S%G2539><s%> I myself <S%G1473><s%> might have <S%G2192><s%> confidence <S%G4006><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> in the flesh. <S%G4561><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> anyone <S%G5100><s%> else <S%G243><s%> has <S%G1380><s%> a mind <S%G1380><s%> to put <S%G3982><s%> confidence <S%G3982><s%> in the flesh, <S%G4561><s%> I far more: <S%G3123><s%>

circumcised <S%G4061><s%> the eighth <S%G3637><s%> day, <S%G3637><s%> of the nation <S%G1085><s%> of Israel, <S%G2474><s%> of the tribe <S%G5443><s%> of Benjamin, <S%G958><s%> a Hebrew <S%G1445><s%> of Hebrews; <S%G1445><s%> as to the Law, <S%G3551><s%> a Pharisee; <S%G5330><s%>
as to zeal, <S%G2205><s%> a persecutor <S%G1377><s%> of the church; <S%G1577><s%> as to the righteousness <S%G1343><s%> which is in the Law, <S%G3551><s%> found <S%G1096><s%> blameless. <S%G273><s%>

But whatever <S%G3748><s%> things <S%G3748><s%> were gain <S%G2771><s%> to me, those <S%G3778><s%> things <S%G3778><s%> I have counted <S%G2233><s%> as loss <S%G2209><s%> for the sake <S%G1223><s%> of Christ. <S%G5547><s%>

More <S%G3304><s%> than <S%G3304><s%> that, I count <S%G2233><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> things <S%G3956><s%> to be loss <S%G2209><s%> in view <S%G1223><s%> of the surpassing <S%G5242><s%> value <S%G5242><s%> of knowing <S%G1108><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> my Lord, <S%G2962><s%> for whom <S%G3739><s%> I have suffered <S%G2210><s%> the loss <S%G2210><s%> of all <S%G3956><s%> things, <S%G3956><s%> and count <S%G2233><s%> them but rubbish <S%G4657><s%> in order <S%G2443><s%> that I may gain <S%G2770><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%>

and may be found <S%G2147><s%> in Him, not having <S%G2192><s%> a righteousness <S%G1343><s%> of my own <S%G1699><s%> derived <S%G1537><s%> from [the] Law, <S%G3551><s%> but that which is through <S%G1223><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%> in Christ, <S%G5547><s%> the righteousness <S%G1343><s%> which [comes] from God <S%G2316><s%> on the basis <S%G1909><s%> of faith, <S%G4102><s%>

that I may know <S%G1097><s%> Him, and the power <S%G1411><s%> of His resurrection <S%G386><s%> and the fellowship <S%G2842><s%> of His sufferings, <S%G3804><s%> being conformed <S%G4832><s%> to His death; <S%G2288><s%>
in order <S%G7055><s%> that I may attain <S%G2658><s%> to the resurrection <S%G1815><s%> from the dead. <S%G3498><s%>

Not that I have already <S%G2235><s%> obtained <S%G2983><s%> [it], or <S%G2228><s%> have already <S%G2235><s%> become perfect, <S%G5048><s%> but I press <S%G1377><s%> on in order <S%G1487><s%> <S%G2532><s%> that I may lay <S%G2638><s%> hold <S%G2638><s%> of that for which <S%G3739><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> I was laid <S%G2638><s%> hold <S%G2638><s%> of by Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus. <S%G2424><s%>

Brethren, <S%G80><s%> I do not regard <S%G3049><s%> myself <S%G1683><s%> as having laid <S%G2638><s%> hold <S%G2638><s%> of [it] yet; <S%G3768><s%> but one <S%G1520><s%> thing <S%G1520><s%> [I do]: forgetting <S%G1950><s%> what [lies] behind <S%G3694><s%> and reaching <S%G1901><s%> forward <S%G1901><s%> to what [lies] ahead, <S%G1715><s%>

I press <S%G1377><s%> on toward <S%G1519><s%> the goal <S%G4649><s%> for the prize <S%G1017><s%> of the upward <S%G507><s%> call <S%G2821><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> in Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus. <S%G2424><s%>

Let us therefore, <S%G3767><s%> as many <S%G3745><s%> as are perfect, <S%G5046><s%> have <S%G5426><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> attitude; <S%G5426><s%> and if <S%G1487><s%> in anything <S%G5100><s%> you have <S%G5426><s%> a different <S%G2088><s%> attitude, <S%G5426><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> will reveal <S%G601><s%> that also <S%G2532><s%> to you;
however, <S%G4133><s%> let us keep living <S%G4748><s%> by that same <S%G846><s%> [standard] to which <S%G3739><s%> we have attained. <S%G5348><s%>

Brethren, <S%G80><s%> join <S%G4831><s%> <S%G1096><s%> in following <S%G4831><s%> my example, <S%G4831><s%> and observe <S%G4648><s%> those <S%G3588><s%> who walk <S%G4043><s%> according <S%G2531><s%> to the pattern <S%G5179><s%> you have <S%G2192><s%> in us.

For many <S%G4183><s%> walk, <S%G4043><s%> of whom <S%G3739><s%> I often <S%G4178><s%> told <S%G3004><s%> you, and now <S%G3568><s%> tell <S%G3004><s%> you even <S%G2532><s%> weeping, <S%G2799><s%> [that they are] enemies <S%G2190><s%> of the cross <S%G4716><s%> of Christ, <S%G5547><s%>

whose <S%G3739><s%> end <S%G5056><s%> is destruction, <S%G684><s%> whose <S%G3739><s%> god <S%G2316><s%> is [their] appetite, <S%G2836><s%> and [whose] glory <S%G1391><s%> is in their shame, <S%G152><s%> who set <S%G5426><s%> their minds <S%G5426><s%> on earthly <S%G1919><s%> things. <S%G1919><s%>

For our citizenship <S%G4175><s%> is in heaven, <S%G3772><s%> from which <S%G3739><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> we eagerly <S%G553><s%> wait <S%G553><s%> for a Savior, <S%G4990><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ; <S%G5547><s%>

who <S%G3739><s%> will transform <S%G3345><s%> the body <S%G4983><s%> of our humble <S%G5014><s%> state <S%G5014><s%> into conformity <S%G4832><s%> with the body <S%G4983><s%> of His glory, <S%G1391><s%> by the exertion <S%G1753><s%> of the power <S%G1410><s%> that He has <S%G1410><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> to subject <S%G5293><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> things <S%G3956><s%> to Himself. <S%G846><s%>
